author: Chan Sek Keong CJ (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: American International Assurance Co Ltd v Wong Cherng Yaw and Others
coram: Chan Sek Keong CJ; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA
counsel: Quentin Loh SC, Elaine Tay and Shannon Tan (Rajah & Tann LLP) for the appellant; Quek Mong Hua and Esther Yee (Lee & Lee) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Interim payments/Circumstances when ordered/Capital investment held in joint stakeholder's account pending determination of claim by insurer for alleged overpayment/Whether investors entitled to return of their capital investment from proceeds of their policies/Whether interim payment ought to be ordered in view of appellant's cross-claims/Order 29 r 12(c) Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2006 Rev Ed)
